hero_tagline: Rooted in Faith. Growing in Purpose.
mission_text: Our mission is to build a Christ-centered community that restores hope and equips people of all ages with biblical teaching, stewardship, and mentorship for education, trades, or entrepreneurship—empowering them to walk in purpose and impact the Kingdom.
footer_about: Kingdom Seeds Foundation is a Christ-centered nonprofit equipping mentees through stewardship, mentorship, and practical opportunity.

monthly_goals.title: Welcome 10 new mentees into mentorship circles.
Launch 3–5 Faith & Stewardship workshops with Bible studies.
Host monthly fellowships to build community and spiritual growth.
Form partnerships with local churches, schools, and community groups.

faqs.a: No. Mentorship with Kingdom Seeds Foundation is free for mentees. Donations help us keep it accessible.
Anyone seeking growth in stewardship, life skills, and spiritual development. If under 17, a parent or guardian must provide consent.

faqs.q: How do I volunteer or mentor?
faqs.a: Use the Volunteer/Mentor form on our site. We’ll review your interests and follow up with next steps.
We process donations securely through a trusted provider. You’ll receive a confirmation email and receipt.
We collaborate with churches, schools, businesses, and community groups to serve mentees and expand impact.

faqs.q: How can we contact Kingdom Seeds?
faqs.a: Email us at info@kingdomseedsfoundation.org and we’ll respond as soon as possible.

newsletter_note: We respect your privacy. We’ll never share your email.
privacy_policy: ### Privacy Policy\nWe value your privacy. We collect only the information necessary to process forms (e.g., newsletter signups, mentee applications). We do not sell your data. We may share information with partners only with your consent and as required to fulfill services. You can request deletion or correction of your personal information by emailing info@kingdomseedsfoundation.org.
donation_thanks: Thank you for sowing into Kingdom Seeds Foundation. Your generosity helps us build a Christ-centered community and equip mentees through stewardship, mentorship, and opportunity.
newsletter_thanks: Thanks for joining our newsletter! We’re glad you’re here.
